comment: The mapping ` F ` is a bijection between the "simple pseudographs" with a fixed set of vertices ` V ` and the subsets of the set of pairs over the set ` V ` . See also the comments on ~ uspgrbisymrel . (Contributed by AV, 25-Nov-2021.)
